https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uloacQBlAofUfQLFTeBxOLYRxsF.jpg Bring Down The Walls looks at the US prison industrial complex through the lens of house music and nightlife. The connection comes from the years in which Phil Collins worked with men incarcerated at Sing Sing, a maximum-security prison in upstate New York. Bring Down The Walls
